name: Noko
description:
Deep below the earth, trapped amongst forgotten rubble, a lonely ember still burns. Take control of Noko to bring light to these dark caverns, leap past perilous obstacles, and discover the secrets of your awakening. But be careful Little Light, for the mist does not bode well...

Controls:

Left click and drag back to jump.

Right click and hold to scout ahead.

Esc to Pause.

Additional Notes: 

-Progress is not saved.

-Safari IS NOT supported. Google Chrome IS supported.

-For the best experience, either download the game or play with a non-maximized window.
